alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 7:39PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Charlotte, southwestern DeSoto and southeastern Sarasota Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 738 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Babcock Ranch, or 14 miles east of Punta Gorda, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Port, Punta Gorda, Port Charlotte, Babcock Ranch, Babcock Webb Wma, Charlotte County Airport, Burnt Store Marina, Murdock, Tropical Gulf Acres, Harbour Heights, Charlotte Park, Cleveland, Pirate Harbor, Lake Suzy, Solana, Fort Ogden and Charlotte Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Sarasota
